attributes.action: Stop The Downsizing Of The Princess Royal Hospital Telford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Telford is already a highly Populated area and is constantly growing , we feel that the downsizing of the Princess Royal Hospital would be detrimental to the Health and Safety of everyone living in the area. For this reason we are against this downsizing as there is a very real possibility that this proposal puts lives at risk.
